channel.title: $20 USD For a FLETCHER!
channel.description:
I am going to pay someone to create a "perfect" fletching script.
It will have to fletch all logs, and also string the fletched bows.
If you currently have a fletcher script, then I will accept an improved version of that, as long as it is excellent quality.
Post here if you are going to do this, and I will contact you for further discussion of details.
Thanks :)

item.title: $20 USD For a FLETCHER!
item.dc:creator: @hdkilla HDKilla
item.description:
@hdkilla wrote:

Ok, Mad, im going to ask you to create this for me, as Star’s isnt complete, and I dont know when it will be complete, its a hassle to talk to Star on MSN anyways, and I understand why, im just saying.

Ill PM you as well Mad, and ill give you my MSN, unless yours is in your profile, havent checked yet

Read full topic

item.title: $20 USD For a FLETCHER!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“Starblaster100, post:7, topic:5933”]I’ve just about finished my own Fletcher.

Cuts anything into Long / Shortbows and Strings them up.

contact me if you’re interested.[/quote]
Will it be in the pay scripts?

Read full topic

item.title: $20 USD For a FLETCHER!
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

[quote=“HDKilla, post:8, topic:5933”]Ok, Mad, thanks for the offer, but if Star already has one almost done, then im going to have to go with that one.

And I have tried frost’s fletcher, and it didnt work.[/quote]

Alright. PM if you need anything

Mad Cow

Read full topic

item.title: $20 USD For a FLETCHER!
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Cow Mad Cow
item.description:
@Mad_Cow wrote:

Janilabo:

Oh yeah. Correct… I am sorry matey I forgot that part haha…

Sorry for spamming your thread Killa, if that doesn’t work i suppose i could make it for $20.
You’ll need to provide me with a members account though.

Dw, i’m trusted.

PM me for my MSN if you’re interested.

Mad Cow
